page.title: 05THE MARINE LAKE AND GROUNDS
page.content: In our block there was a spacious park,there were swings,a round-about and also a lake inhabited by ducks mainly mallards,and blackheaded gulls. There were two hockey pitches,tennis courts and a bowling green. In the play area there were junior swings and infant swings.There was a fairly big slide,but unfortunately people had been climbing{up}the slide.Also on the round-about and other areas of the park there were pieces of graffiti.It is an ideal place for the elderly to take their dogs for a walk.It could also be relaxing for some people just to sit on a bench and feed the ducks.What I thought was strange was that the kiosk which usually sells ice-creams and drinks was not open,but it was{November!}According to some children the kiosk was only open on weekends. {PAUL KITCHEN
